alert.note: Alert for Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 11:25PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Valley and northern Sherman Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1125 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arcadia, or 20 miles southwest of Ord, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Arcadia around 1130 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central Nebraska.
